item.title: Mass General Brigham Spins Out Generative AI Startup
item.description: The tool’s primary application is to accelerate and improve the accuracy of patient screening for clinical trials.

item.title: Sobi Grows Its Gout Drug Prospects With $950M Acquisition of Startup Arthrosi Therapeutics
item.description: Arthrosi Therapeutics’ pozdeutinurad is in Phase 3 testing as a treatment for uncontrolled gout.

item.title: TPG Takes Nearly $600 Million Hit On Cosmetics Investment
item.description: The private equity giant cut its stake in Anastasia Beverly Hills from 38% to 6%.

item.title: Lawyers Outline The Opportunities Defining Today’s Global Life Sciences Market
item.description: These Biglaw partners have the scoop on the trends -- and trouble spots -- every market player should be preparing for in life sciences work.

item.title: This Year’s Hottest Healthcare Company Isn’t Even a Healthcare Company
item.description: Nvidia's restraint — focusing on enabling the ecosystem rather than owning it — has helped cement its role as the indispensable backbone of the health...
